Hand Washing: Use water and salt to wash hands, as salt has natural antibacterial properties.
Disinfectant: Create a homemade disinfectant using essential oils like tea tree oil, which has strong antimicrobial properties.
Air Freshener: Use a mixture of essential oils and water to create a natural air freshener.
Laundry: Use a mixture of vinegar and water to clean clothes, as vinegar has natural disinfectant properties.
Toilet Cleaning: Use a mixture of baking soda and water to clean the toilet bowl, as baking soda has natural cleaning and deodorizing properties.
